- 🎓  **Master of Science in Data Science**, Willamette University

- 🔗  Developed **G**raphlet Characterization of **R**egulatory and **Ph**ysical **I**nteraction **N**etworks ([GRPhIN](https://doi.org/10.1093/bioadv/vbaf176)) and [ProteinWeaver](https://doi.org/10.1101/2024.10.24.620032)
